attributes.action: Pay reparations to countries (e.g. Jamaica) affected by British trade in slaves.
attributes.background: The UK is (in world terms) a stable and infrastructurally well-developed country in which to live and be creative.  These conditions and the opportunities that they allow us are not simply owed to luck; they have been enabled by invested wealth that was generated by the slave trade.  We owe debts.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109625
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
